articles.title: U.S. adds 250k jobs in October, wage growth soars
articles.description: Wages grew 3.1% year-over-year, the biggest jump since 2009.
articles.content: The U.S. added 250,000 jobs in October, beating the 190,000 jobs estimate from economists, the Labor Department said on Friday. Unemployment rate held at 3.7%, a nearly 50-year low, while wages grew 3.1% year-over-year, the biggest jump since 2009. Why it mat… [+184 chars]
